item.title: FEEDBACK
item.description: I’ve learned a lot recently about feedback. As an audio engineer, it’s something I know a lot about in practice. But I’d done so little thinking about it as a means for understanding systems. I was too busy toiling in the field of electronics, to realize that feedback takes place in nature all around us, and is key to understanding knowledge itself. Feedback is a simple concept with overwhelming, enormous implications.
